problem: 如图,PA、PB切⊙O于点A、B,PA=10,CD切⊙O于点E,交PA、PB于C、D两点,则△PCD的周长是()
answer: 解:∵PA、PB切⊙O于点A、B,CD切⊙O于点E,∴PA=PB=10,CA=CE,DE=DB,∴△PCD的周长是PC+CD+PD=PC+AC+DB+PD=PA+PB=10+10=20．故选:C．
comment: 本题考查了切线长定理的应用,关键是求出△PCD的周长=PA+PB
problem_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB are tangent to ⊙O at points A and B, PA = N_0, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point E, and intersects PA and PB at C and D, then the perimeter of △PCD is ()
